judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schafeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.

opinions.text:
Pee Curiam,
Upon consideration of the whole record in this case, the judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion by Judge Gordon.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Francis M. McAdams, with him Otto Kraus, Jr., for appellant.
Robert T. McCraclcen, with him Ulric J. Mengert, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Weglein v. Golder, Appellant.
Argued January 7, 1935.
Before Frazer, C. J., Simpson, Kephart, Schafeer, Maxey, Drew and Linn, JJ.
February 4, 1935:
Francis M. McAdams, with him Otto Kraus, Jr., for appellant.
Robert T. McCraclcen, with him Ulric J. Mengert, for appellee.
